item.title: How i make death emote when i die
item.dc:creator: @Gh0stb4rr4g3 Gh0stb4rr4g3
item.description:
@Gh0stb4rr4g3 wrote:

U just forgot a }

Copy and paste this :

[code] }
} catch (Exception e) {}
deleteItem(6570, getItemSlot(6570), 1);
sendMessage(“Your Fire Cape vanishes as it hits the floor”);
}

stillgfx(432, absY, absX);

    removeAllItems();

pEmote = 2304;
    actionTimer = 3;

    teleportToX = 2512;
    teleportToY = 3863;
    
    // pWalk = 13;
    sendMessage("OH EM GEE YOU DIED!");
    hitDiff = 0;	
    updateRequired = true;
    appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}[/code][br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 31, 2008, 08:10:40 am[/size][hr]Change the TeleportToX

and the TeleportToY

To the cordinates where you want 2 tele if you are dead.

Read full topic

item.title: How i make death emote when i die
item.dc:creator: @Gh0stb4rr4g3 Gh0stb4rr4g3
item.description:
@Gh0stb4rr4g3 wrote:

Search:

ApplyDead();

And than search for the Text like “Oh dear you are dead.”

But don’t use that one , use the text u see if u are dead in ur server.

Like i see “OH EM GE…” So i search for

Search:

ApplyDead();

So i search for

ApplyDead();

And scrolled up a bit

and found :

[code]stillgfx(432, absY, absX);

    removeAllItems();

pEmote = 2304;
    actionTimer = 3;

    teleportToX = 2512;
    teleportToY = 3863;
    
    // pWalk = 13;
    sendMessage("OH EM GEE YOU DIED!");
    hitDiff = 0;	
    updateRequired = true;
    appearanceUpdateRequired = true;[/code]

Hope this helped a bit.

Read full topic

item.title: How i make death emote when i die
item.dc:creator: @Gh0stb4rr4g3 Gh0stb4rr4g3
item.description:
@Gh0stb4rr4g3 wrote:

You don’t have 2 add the real emote.

I added a gfx which looks like a death emote.

Just add this

stillgfx(199, absY, absX);

Right here:

[code]stillgfx(432, absY, absX);

    removeAllItems();

pEmote = 2304;
    actionTimer = 3;

    teleportToX = 2512;
    teleportToY = 3863;
    
    // pWalk = 13;
    sendMessage("OH EM GEE YOU DIED!");
    hitDiff = 0;	
    updateRequired = true;
    appearanceUpdateRequired = true;[/code]

Hope this helped.

Read full topic
